## LotusWalletProvider.walletImport() method

walletImport returns the private key of an address in the wallet.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
walletImport(keyInfo: KeyInfo): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  keyInfo | KeyInfo |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string&gt;
